name: Asociace starožitníků, z.s.
memberOrga: Membership is open to both legal entities (75) as well as private individuals (cca 90) and it includes antique and art dealers, restorers, experts and collectors.
goal:
- To represent the interests of art and antique dealers.
- To cooperate with other professional associations both within the Czech republic and internationally as well as with relevant state institutions on issues affecting the trade in art and antiques.
- To organise and run its own educational programmes.
- To organise its own Trade Fair.
- To work with museums, galleries and experts in relevant fields in deepening the knowledge of cultural heritage and to contribute to preservation and restoration of cultural items
interests: Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Environment, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
- Import of Cultural Goods
- Survey on Ivory Trade in the EU
- Droit De Suite (Artists Resale Rights)
